name: Full Width Header
description:
Makes the Tumblr Header expand to the full width of the window. 

Works everywhere on Tumblr where there is a header.
additional_info:
5/7/2015:
  • Slightly cleaned up CSS.
5/6/2015:
  • The logo now stays on the page rather than being partially off of it.
5/4/2015:
  • Fixed bug where header margins would be different if the window was sized differently.
5/3/2015:
  • Initial Release.
